title: How to Balance the Solar Plexus Chakra

steps.title: Take a walk in the sun or sit by a fire to balance the solar plexus chakra.
steps.content: Take a walk in the sun or sit by a fire to balance the solar plexus chakra. This charka’s natural element is fire, so basking in sunlight or roasting marshmallows on a campfire can help center your energy—not to mention fill your belly! Reconnecting with nature’s fiery elements is a natural way to boost your confidence, so get warm and toasty the next time you feel down. [1] X Research source

steps.title: The solar plexus chakra’s mantra is “I can.
steps.content: The solar plexus chakra’s mantra is “I can. ” There’s no better way to boost your self-confidence by being kind to yourself. [2] X Expert Source Emily Christensen Spiritual Advisor & Founder of Rainbow Raaja Expert Interview. 11 March 2022. The solar plexus’ energy comes from within you, so look at yourself in the mirror, redirect any negative thoughts, and remind yourself of everything you can do. [3] X Research source Here are some affirmations you can try: “I can do hard things.” “I can be kind to myself.” “I can create the life I want to live.”

steps.title: The solar plexus chakra is represented with yellow.
steps.content: The solar plexus chakra is represented with yellow. Putting on a yellow outfit is an easy way to boost this chakra’s energy and put a smile on your face. So, brighten up your day by throwing on a yellow shirt, tossing on some yellow socks, adding a yellow headband to your look, or even painting your nails yellow. [4] X Research source If you don’t have something yellow to wear, no worries! Try surrounding yourself with yellow instead by setting out some yellow flowers or looking at yellow pictures online.

steps.title: Corn, lemons, and bananas can balance your solar plexus chakra.
steps.content: Corn, lemons, and bananas can balance your solar plexus chakra. This chakra’s color is yellow, so eating yellow foods is a great way to bring the chakra’s energy into your body. Try adding a banana to your breakfast, drinking a glass of lemon water, or having a side of corn with dinner.

steps.title: Lemongrass, ginger, and rosemary will open your senses and solar plexus chakra.
steps.content: Lemongrass, ginger, and rosemary will open your senses and solar plexus chakra. Essential oils are an excellent and calming way to balance your energy. You can diffuse them around your living space or dab them on your wrists to brighten your energy. Try a combination of oils, or stick with the scent you love the most to give you that extra confidence boost. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Gain confidence in mind, body, and spirit while balancing the solar plexus chakra.
steps.content: Gain confidence in mind, body, and spirit while balancing the solar plexus chakra. Not only will heat-building poses spark the solar plexus’ fire element, but they will also make you feel strong. You can do hard things, and that belief will do wonders to balance your energy. Try adding these fiery poses to your next yoga flow: [6] X Research source Sun Salutation Warrior Bow Half Twist Boat Pose

steps.title: Balance your solar plexus chakra by taking time out of your day to be mindful.
steps.content: Balance your solar plexus chakra by taking time out of your day to be mindful. [7] X Expert Source Emily Christensen Spiritual Advisor & Founder of Rainbow Raaja Expert Interview. 11 March 2022. Sit in a comfortable position with your hands in front of your stomach. Touch your fingers together and point them out in front of you. Cross your thumbs, making sure to keep your fingers as straight as possible. Close your eyes and focus on your solar plexus chakra, imagining it spinning with bright yellow light. Chant RAM sounded out as “R-ah-ng,” and let your energy wash over you. [8] X Research source Repeat this meditation whenever you’re feeling doubtful and indecisive. This will remind you that you can be in control, if only for a moment.

steps.title: The solar plexus chakra is powered by generosity.
steps.content: The solar plexus chakra is powered by generosity. Being kind to others can not only give you a boost of confidence, but can also help you feel good about yourself. When you give to others, you give to yourself. Try complimenting someone, volunteering in your community, or giving someone you love a gift.

steps.title: Seek out new experiences to balance your solar plexus chakra.
steps.content: Seek out new experiences to balance your solar plexus chakra. Your confidence is rooted in your joy. If you’re feeling indecisive or down lately, it may be because you're growing tired of your routine. Branch out and try something new. This could be learning a new hobby, venturing down a different path on a walk, or traveling somewhere new. [9] X Research source Remember that every day is different, and it’s up to you to choose how you spend it. You can be in control of your life.

steps.title: Tiger’s eye, citrine, and amber can help balance your energy.
steps.content: Tiger’s eye, citrine, and amber can help balance your energy. [10] X Expert Source Emily Christensen Spiritual Advisor & Founder of Rainbow Raaja Expert Interview. 11 March 2022. Crystals store and spread energy, and can be the perfect addition to any balancing practice. Wear them around your neck, set them on your nightstand, or keep them close in your pocket to help give you a boost of energy.

steps.title: Balancing your solar plexus chakra is an inward battle.
steps.content: Balancing your solar plexus chakra is an inward battle. Your self-confidence may not come easily, and that’s okay. If you’ve gone through an emotional or psychological event that’s left you questioning your self-worth, reach out to a licensed therapist or counselor for support. They will be able to help you navigate the trauma and practice mindful steps to balance your energy.
